## Aerological Observations at the Upper Air Station at Baker Lake, Nunavut

### Solicitation Details

**Title:** Aerological Observations at the Upper Air Station at Baker Lake, Nunavut
**Solicitation Number:** 5000071630
**Files:**

* **English:** [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9253/5000071630_upper-air---baker-lake-nu_rfp_en.pdf)
* **French:** [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9253/5000071630_upper-air---baker-lake-nu_rfp_fr.pdf)

### Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor to provide aerological observations at the Upper Air Station in Baker Lake, Nunavut. The contractor will be responsible for preparing instruments and conducting two upper air soundings per day, 365 days a year, to monitor data and messages produced, and ensure prompt transmission of data.

### Scope of Work

The scope of the work includes:

* Preparing instruments for upper air soundings
* Conducting two (2) upper air soundings per day, 365 days a year
* Monitoring data and messages produced
* Ensuring prompt transmission of data

### Security Requirements

Security requirements are associated with this requirement. Potential bidders should consult Part 6 of the solicitation documents for additional information.

### Contractual Obligations

The contract is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other trade agreements.

### Social Procurement

ECCC encourages bidders to maximize Inuit employment, subcontracting, and on-the-job training opportunities, and involve local, regional, and Inuit businesses in carrying out the work.

### Debriefing

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

### Languages

Environment and Climate Change Canada provides procurement services in both official languages. Bidders may submit a bid in the official language of their choice.

### Contact

For additional information, interested suppliers should contact the Contracting Officer named in this Notice.

### Closing Date

The tender closing date is 2023-10-31T14:00:00. The deadline for submission of bids is strictly adhered to.
